meanings.sent1: The ancient kingdom was led by wise sovereigns.
meanings.sent2: The sovereigns of the land made important decisions for their people.
meanings.sent3: The two rival sovereigns decided to settle their dispute with a game of chess.
meanings.sent4: In the chess game of life, we are all mere pawns to the sovereigns of fate.
meanings.sent5: The sovereigns' crowns gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of their power.
